definitions.definition: To persistently endeavor to obtain an object, or bring about an event.
definitions.example: to solicit alms, or a favour

definitions.definition: To persuade or incite one to commit some act, especially illegal or sexual behavior.
definitions.example: If you want to lose your virginity, you should try to solicit some fine looking women.

definitions.definition: To offer to perform sexual activity, especially when for a payment.
definitions.example: My girlfriend tried to solicit me for sex, but I was tired.

definitions.definition: To disturb or trouble; to harass.
To urge the claims of; to plead; to act as solicitor for or with reference to.
